name: 52 Pickup (QCortex07)
description:
Your 'playmate' decided to play a trick on you, and now your deck of cards have flown away. Collect all 52 cards with the help of your trusty die to win! Be careful, however: These cards have a say in whether they willingly get picked up. Other lost pieces will help you survive as you traverse the four "Suites": The lush Club Forest, HearthTown, SpadesFort, and the Diamond Palace.

52 Pickup was inspired by the popular card game, 52 Pickup, in which the player picks up 52 cards. Level Design by QCortex07. Art by katcherri. Music by lemons^3. Special thanks to _beesus.
